title: @Reorder
description: Reorder sub-bricks of a dataset based on event mapping. Works similarly to the Reorder plugin.

mapfile.title: Map File
mapfile.description: TR to event mapping file (e.g. events.txt)

save_work.description: Do not delete work directory (reorder.work.dir) at the end
